phrases: I found an invitation in my shoe locker
Invitation for Mizutani Shizuku We are Having a Christmas Party Time: Second Friday Place: Misawa Batting Center Santa's coming too!!
but the next day, after gym,
it popped up again in my bag.
the contents of my bag had been disturbed,
I just wanted to surprise you!
Natsume-san, do you know what you are saying?
We zip in, then zip right out!
Well, I guess this is nothing new,
He refuses to leave my side,
like he is scared of something.
Do not run off without me!
It gets especially bad once we are outside school.
He is acting just like he was
when he started coming back to class.
I wanted to have a serious talk with him before winter began...
I thought he would be the most excited about Christmas.
Let us hang, let us hang, let us hang!
Let us hang, let us hang, let us hang!
You are going to a Christmas party!
You can only come if you have one of these invitations!
Okay, that means we will have a total of...
He does not get to come.
I am coming and that is that!
Because you said you are in love with Shizuku.
You cannot believe everything you hear!
I do not know what just happened,
but let us buy some chicken!
Oh, make sure you get enough for us!
You talk way too damn much, moron!
Are you in love with Shizuku?
Damn, why did I say that?
How could I be attracted to this girl?!
Natsume-chan, where is the party being held?
We are having a Christmas party.
Well, we got in a fight here with Haru and the study bug.
Can you stay away from them?
That fool finally made a friend.
If I see you here again, I will break your legs.
I bet that guy's totally killed someone before!
but try to keep it down.
She is a bit different from the rest of us.
you were not answering your phone.
Are not you coming to the Christmas party?
Oh, I was in a meeting...
Did not you receive an invitation?
I thought it was meant as a prank.
If you are coming, we can go together.
Sorry, today's not a good day.
I really think you should come, Oshima-san!
And reindeer are people who did bad things in their previous life!
Why are you dressed like that?
The plan was for me to bring in the cake,
Is not that the girl from the cultural festival?
How are you going to respond, Mizutani-san?
She is in love with Haru.
Does she realize how lucky she is to be able to say that?
Well, I am going to cut the cake now.
Oh, time to cut the cake?
I think she is avoiding me.
Cannot blame her for falling so hard.
Even I thought he was kind of cool.
Anyway, Haru's participating in a Christmas party.
He looks just like your average high school student now.
I need to hit the restroom.
Who ate two pieces of cake?!
You do not get to hit on her first!
You are not supposed to tell people that!
Want me to knock you silly?!
I will jam two fingers up your ass!
Two fingers do not scare me!
And it is just going to be the two of us?
First question, what stays still, but is always running?
Did you get your assignment back?
Am I the one who is weird here?
Can you guys stop fighting in here?
Have not seen one in ages!
Mizutani-san, how can you study at a time like this?
I do not know how to react to all of this.
You need to stop worrying so much.
Yeah, it is safe to just ignore them.
Haru, show it to us again!
And when it looks like things are getting crazy...
You do this to let them know.
You went to Kaimei Academy, Yoshida-kun?
That is where I went to grade school.
I do not remember this guy.
Do you remember the push-off incident?
So you were the one responsible for the mashed-face incident?!
You did stuff like that in grade school?
Are you also attending the winter session at that cram school?
Are you in the special college prep course, too?
No, I am in the normal one...
I am also taking that course.
You are taking the same course?
It starts next week and runs through the end of the year with no breaks.
I did not know you were so serious about your studies.
Can you stop staring at me?
Besides, you do not need the help.
Why am I making a competition of this?
Thank you for your help, Yamaken-kun.
You helped me reach a decision.
You gave me some advice a while back.
I have decided to have a talk with Haru very soon.
You have already made up your mind?
Is not that a little too fast?
Spend some more time thinking this through!
I do not understand what you mean.
Please stop bothering Haru-kun and Mitty.
It is not your business, so stay out of it!
You should stay out of it, then.
Y-You have no chance with Mitty!
It is like you guys are still in grade school!
If that is what you think, then what about her?
She confessed to Haru during the cultural festival.
O-Oshima-san knows her place, so it is okay!
I did not mean it in a bad way!
I can teach you a trick for cheering yourself up?
So you draw a circle on your palm, then...
I know this online community that provides emotional support.
You have no chance with Mitty!
Sounds like you are having fun at your new school.
I remember that you always said you wanted friends.
If I offered to become your friend in exchange for Mizutani-san,
I do not need you if I have Shizuku.
You did not need to answer.
What if Mizutani-san says that she likes me more?
What are you doing up there?
It is like a spider's thread.
It is long and thin, like spider thread.
Where God dangles a spider's thread before the bad guy.
The guy gets partway up before he is dropped back down.
God should not be so cruel.
It was probably meant as a test of his conscience.
But that thread was his only chance at salvation.
Who would not try to shake everyone else off?
The Christmas party was a lot of fun, having everyone together.
Next up is staying home for New Year's.
stay home during the New Year holiday,
you will have good health next year.
You are already moving on to next year?
Do you have to take that winter prep course?
Cannot you study just fine without that?
You are going to spend your whole winter break with him?
There is no point in telling him that he does not need to worry.
I wanted to talk to you before the course started.
I have to tell him how I feel.
So you do not need to worry.
I have made up my mind.
Th-That means you will not take the winter prep course?
Are not you supposed to be in love with me?!
I told you not to come!
Are you listening to me, Shizuku?!
I decide what I want to do!
Do not interfere with my studies!
This is as far as you go.
It is a good thing Haru's an idiot.
My winter prep course has begun.
Go straight home as soon as it is over!
Are you listening to me, Shizuku?!
That is the guy you like?
